metadata.title: CVE-2020-25032 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Flask-CORS (aka CORS Middleware for Flask) before 3.0.9. It allows ../ directory traversal to access private resources because resource matching does not ensure that pathnames are in a canonical format.

criterions.comment: python-flask-cors package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.9-2').
